item.title: Israel-Gaza live updates: Explosions across Gaza as expected ceasefire nears
item.description: President Donald Trump said earlier Wednesday he may go to the Middle East in the coming days.

item.title: What to know about the capture of the last of 10 escapees from a New Orleans jail
item.description: All 10 fugitives who made a brazen escape from a New Orleans jail in May are back in custody after the last inmate was captured in Atlanta
